At the next down-ramp, the Cadillac descends and Tony's b find themselves doing 70 knots side by side with Eddie in the other lane. In the narrow concrete tunnel, the two cars battle each o like bulls in a chute, each one trying to cut the other o bouncing from each other into the walls and back again.
The goon next to Luna is trying to get a shot off at Eddi
This sonovabitch is crazy!
Tony sees his chance and he lunges for the gun. In the  struggle, the gun goes off and drills Rocco, the driver,  through the side of the head.

The Cadillac ROARS out of control, its dead driver's foot pressing the accelerator to the floor. Scalese, in the fr seat, tries to grab the wheel. Eddie is all over the road trying to avoid them. The rive and the curve are ahead. Scalese's car hits the median at high speed, rolls, and s SCREAMING into a concrete pillar and EXPLODES. Eddie stands on the brakes as his car slides alongside th flaming wreckage.
Eddie's car is on fire now, and the doors have been ramme shut. He kicks the window out on the passenger side.
Eddie runs for his life. The explosion knocks him to his  knees. He gets up and moves away, looking back at Luna's and  Scalese's spectacular funeral pyre.
The fire engines and police cars are arriving from every  direction. With the flames still lighting his face, Eddie is making call.
You tell Luis I got Tony Luna for  him. Get me a time and place.

Diana is in bad shape. She is tied up. Numb with terror s listens, not comprehending, as the Comachos discuss their plans for her in Spanish. Luis comes over to her, and with his knife begins cutting off part of her clothes.
Your cop friend is smart. Too smart  and he dies. Then I take care of you  personally.
Eddie's car is totally ablaze. He walks past the streamin hoses and slips into a parked blue and white, it's mars l still flashing. He roars off.

The giant door opens, and a lone blue and white pulls in parks. The place is deserted except for the duty officer who sit in his tiny office watching television with his half-nake girlfriend. Eddie enters silently, glances into the duty office, and  heads to the other end of the large hall. In the background we see the practice apartment set, the  boxing ring, and several special task force undercover  vehicles seen before.
Eddie opens his locker and takes out his sawed-off automa shotgun. He checks the action. He loads it. He fills a du bag with ammo and drops in another gun. He closes the loc and heads out.
The duty officer is still occupied. Eddie eases past him checks the key-board at the desk. He finds what he's look for. He lifts a set of keys from the hook.
From inside, we hear the SOUND of a TRUCK STARTING.

This city garbage van, an immense blue semi-trailer, is m south on the Dan Ryan at incredible speed, pushing traffi out of the way like a battleship slicing through Sunday  boaters. Eddie is at the wheel.

Among the dockside ruins of the old facility, Luis carefu checks his snipers and lookouts. Shouting in Spanish, he  directs them into position. From the distance we see a signal from the Comacho statio at the top of a huge grain elevator overlooking the Calum Harbor.
Kosalas enters. The place is in chaos. He joins the crowd gathered in the center of the facility. Brennan and Cragi are here. So is Music. Commander Kates has just arrived.
What the hell is goin on?
Cusack made off with a truckload of  armour.
(shakes his head) He's a fucking one man army now.
What'd I tell ya. The sonofabitch is  crazy.
Kosalas wanders through the wreckage. He is stunned. He i starting to wake up.
OK, everybody. No more games. Where's  Cusack.
The men all look at him silently. Kosalas turns on them.
I can't swallow this shit! Eddie  Cusack's out there takin' on the  world by himself. And you fuckin'  heros are gonna sit on your goddamn  asses!
He is mad and loud.
Cool it kid.
Don't you fuckin' tell me to cool  it. I won't cool it. I'm not going  to fuckin' lie for you any more. (to Kates) I lied, Commander. He laid a gun on  that kid. I saw the whole thing.
You little fuckin' bastard!

Cragie jumps at Kosalas, but Kosalas is ready for him, an braces Cragie against the wall. With one hand Kosalas slams Cragie again, and reaches dow with his free hand, lifting Cragie's pants leg and extrac a drop-gun from it's concealed holster.
What's this for partner? Your next  fuck up?
Kates steps in and separates them.
(to the others) Get someone in the air. We're gonna  find Cusack.
Diana, now hanging from her wrists like a slab of beef, i guarded by a couple of Luis' boys, eyeing her hungrily. Luis enters.
(subtitles) Take off the gag. I want them to  hear her.
Luis scans the daybreak sky. He and Efren take up positio Above them and around them, every line of fire is covered
From the lookout's POV atop the towering grain elevator, SEE several garbage trucks moving in and out of an adjace dump. One of them seems familiar to us.
Eddie's eyes search the harbour as he maneuvers slowly  alongside a rusting freighter. He stops and gets out.
Eddie opens the rear of the truck and lowers a ramp.
Here we go partner.
He picks up his gun and a duffle bag from the cab and hea out.
The Comachos are ready and waiting. Luis walks through th middle of the vast empty plant toward the front, checking his troops one last time.

Against the grotesque shapes of the surrounding scrapyard Eddie moves quickly from one concealment to the next, cro low, advancing on the abandoned factory at the end of the dock. He lays down his duffle and pulls out a Halliburton case. opens it.
From inside the garbage truck WE HEAR an ENGINE STARTING. REVS a couple of times. And from within the container  compartment of the truck emerges the Prowler. It clatters down the ramp.

The lookout spots the Prowler moving down the dock. He ca believe his eyes. He sights on the machine and FIRES. And in the distance, the Prowler senses the insult and  immediately turns its camera eye up to him. The lookout FIRES again. Immediately, the turret swivels the twin MACHINEGUNS ROAR. It's a long way down.
The SOUND of MACHINEGUN FIRE from outside galvanizes the  Comachos. Luis runs through the long building toward the  front with half a dozen of his men, all SHOUTING.

Eddies eyes watch the miniature monitor of the Prowler's  hand controller. On the monitor WE CAN SEE the Comachos  running out in the front of the factory from the camera o top of the Prowler. Eddie gets up and moves toward the factory. He looks up a several high broken windows.

The Prowler is having a field day. It's electronic sensor trace the source of every hostile shot and immediately re a withering stream of hot lead that chews the surrounding scenery -- and several Comachos -- to pieces.
